english.segment1: the secret codes - that we impose on ourselves. when we know we're wrong - from wrong to right. from day to night - I've seen all that I care to see and more
english.segment2: He's waiting - He's waiting for you. lost again - my dearest friend. looks like your - lost again. my dearest friend
english.segment4: I'm calling on You - I need You here tonight
english.segment5: You're lost again - my dearest friend. I hope you find your way back home
english.segment6: may flights of angels - slowly guide you. slowly guide you home
english.segment7: He's waiting - He's waiting for you. lost again - my dearest friend. looks like your - lost agai. my dearest friend
english.segment9: I'm calling on You - I need You here tonight
